mapper.select: select client_key as clientKey, (select client.name from client where log.client_key = client.client_key) as clientName, port,sum(flow) as flow,date from log group by client_key,date,port order by log.date desc ;
mapper.insert: insert into log(client_key, port, flow, date) values(#{clientKey},#{port} ,#{flow} ,CURRENT_DATE())
